# R Pros and Cons
-   Pros
      - free, latest statistical techniques, purpose-built packages, community support
-   Cons
      - slow, inconsistency in packages, focus on results instead of software engineering processes


# What You Will Learn
-   Understand data types, functions, environments and how to use the condition system
-   Understand what functional programming means
-   Know about object-oriented systems in R 
-   Understand metaprogramming
-   Understand what slows R down or uses a lot of memory
